title: Day 39 : 22 August 2002 (10 entries)

39.006 concept: Take existing t-shirts that are either seconds or sold on clearance. Use original graphics as a background image to the word "typophile".

author: Jared Benson

comments.content: Yes. That's my winner so far.

Re: 39.004   
How do you do through the design process only to submit it with the site spelled wrong? Careless.

39.005's front is a bit too Christian, but the back is really great! It needs a matching front.   
   
hhp
39.002 has some nice simplicity, although any reference to what we do here is totally abstracted. This guy has consistently submitted great tees.
